Name: Bandar Seri Begawan
Description: The capital city of Brunei, located on the north coast of the island of Borneo, known for its rich culture, royal palaces, and impressive architecture.

Name: Belait
Description: A district in the western part of Brunei, known for its oil and gas industry, as well as natural attractions like parks and beaches.

Name: Tutong
Description: A district located in central Brunei, known for its scenic landscapes, traditional villages, and agricultural activities.

Name: Temburong
Description: A district in the eastern part of Brunei, known for its lush rainforests, wildlife, and unique geographical location, separated from the rest of Brunei by Malaysia.
